text: At Early Morning () is a 1965 Soviet drama film directed by Tatyana Lioznova.В ЕМАНЖЕЛИНСКЕ МАСШТАБНАЯ РЕКОНСТРУКЦИЯ КИНОТЕАТРА ЗАВЕРШИЛАСЬ ОТКРЫТИЕМ МЕМОРИАЛЬНОЙ ДОСКИ НИКОЛАЯ МЕРЗЛИКИНАКалендарь дат и событий. 16 апреля 2010Умер известный актер Николай Мерзликин: актерские работы == Plot == Alyosha and Nadia early lost their parents, but the father's friend and the people around him helped them to maintain kindness and openness.Рано утром == Cast == * Nikolay Merzlikin as Alesha Smirnov * Valeriy Nosik as Dimka * Nina Nikitina as Nadya Smirnova * Olga Bobkova as Nadya Smirnova * Oleg Zhakov as Nikolai Nikolaevich * Nina Sazonova as Galina Petrovna * Zinaida Vorkul as Olya's mother * Margarita Lifanova as Zhanna Vasilyevna * Yelena Maksimova as Dimka's mother * Ivan Ryzhov as Dmitri DmitrievichРано утром (1966) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1965 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: At Early Morning
